metadata.title: Friday, 23rd September, 2022
metadata.session: SECOND SESSION OF THE THIRTEENTH ASSEMBLY

questions.minister: Minister of Local Government and Rural Development
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to introduce monthly salaries for councilors;
(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented; and
(c) if there are no such plans, why.
(a) how much fuel reserves the country had, as of February, 2022;
(b) whether there are any plans to increase the reserves at any given time; and
(c) if so, when the plans will be implemented.

questions.minister: Minister of Infrastructure, Housing and Urban Development
parts: (a) why works on Phase III of the construction of Chama General Hospital have stalled;
(c) what the cost of the outstanding works is; and
(d) what the time frame for the completion of the project is.

questions.minister: Minister of Health when an ambulance will be procured for Mwinilunga District Hospital to enhance its operations.
Minister of Water Development and Sanitation
parts: (a) whether the Government has any plans to construct a water reticulation system at Kale Island in Kabinga Chiefdom in Kanchibiya Parliamentary Constituency; and

(b) if so, when the plans will be implemented. ORDER OF THE DAY 1. Thanks – His Excellency the President’s Address - Motion (13th September) - Resumption of Debate: (Mr Sing’ombe, MP). ____________________________
